channel.title: About-mes on Alan Hollis

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Leading development teams I've learned not just to manage, but to listen, to motivate and to inspire. Through consulting, I've learned the art of the sale, the value of long lasting connections and the power of recommendation. As a support engineer I've learned to not plaster over problems, but to get to the heart of them. Programming has, through practice, hard work and dedication, given me the skills and experience to solve problems.
